original_text: That wicked person realized that he was doing bad things. So he turned away from his sins. Because of that he will certainly continue to live. He will not die.
korean_text: 그가 스스로 헤아리고 그 행한 모든 죄악에서 돌이켜 떠났으니 반드시 살고 죽지 아니하리라
